caption.title: CHIKV-associated disease in adults vs aged mice.
caption.p: Adult and aged C57BL/6J mice were infected with 10 5 CCID 50 per mouse of CHIKV LR2006-OPY1 via subcutaneous injection of the right hind footpad and monitored for 14 days. A, D] Weights normalized to day 0 measurements are shown by vaccine formulation and age. B, E] Right foot size normalized to day 0 measurements are shown by vaccine formulation and age. C, F] Normalized left foot sizes are shown. The mean Â± S.E.M are reported. The grey area loosely represents measurement variabilities observed in the non-infected left foot size of adult mice.
